items.content_html: The xxAPI repository is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify common DOM manipulation tasks, handle AJAX requests, manage cookies and local storage, and provide utilities for smooth scrolling, function throttling, script loading, URL manipulation, and random data generation.
